name: Chainpoint
description: Open standard for creating a timestamp proof of any data, file, or process.
description_long: Chainpoint links a hash of your data to a blockchain and returns a timestamp proof. A Chainpoint Node receives hashes which are aggregated together using a Merkle tree. The root of this tree is published in a Bitcoin transaction. The final Chainpoint proof defines a set of operations that cryptographically link your data to the Bitcoin blockchain.
